dev_card.eco_conference.description: Asya i yावië parma ar holë er harma mir elda as nat carda yондolië amba i nórë yावië parma.

dev_card.highway_madness.description: Taca atta astar tier coar carir quenner.
dev_card.trading_frenzy.description: Holta ilye neldë harmar mir i malta.
dev_card.monopoly.description: Quet er harma. Illí arani eldar carir antë len illí harmar sina tyávë.

hint.turn.highway_madness: Tecë as car atta tier úqua.

hint.turn.monopoly: Quet harma tyávë as holë mir illë súrer.
hint.turn.steal_resource: Tecë mir ostolië amba as holë harma mir enya elda.
hint.turn.repair_tile: Tecë mir carda úmaitë as fairë sí.
hint.turn.move_robber: Tecë mir carda as asya i holdo ar holë harma mir súro as nat ostolië amba.
hint.turn.build_settlement: Tecë mir arda mára as car ostolië.
hint.turn.build_road: Tecë mir ráva mára as car tië.
hint.turn.build_city: Tecë mir enya ostolier as ورrúna sí mi osto yावië.
